Create 3' UTR features.

Source: R/features.r
create_utrs3.Rd

Create 3' UTR features.

Usage

create_utrs3(x)

Arguments

x

ivl_df in BED12 format

See also

Other feature functions: create_introns(), create_tss(), create_utrs5()

Examples

x <- read_bed12(valr_example('mm9.refGene.bed.gz'))

create_utrs3(x)
